content: It is impossible to know for sure what would have happened if colonial powers had not exploited and controlled other countries for their own gain. However, it is reasonable to believe that many of the negative impacts of colonialism, such as uneven development and political instability, could have been avoided if colonized countries had been able to develop their own economies and political systems. It is essential to continue to acknowledge and address these issues to promote a more equitable and just global system.
